titles.title: To restore the grave marker allowance for veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension, Insurance and Memorial Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Compensation, Pension, Insurance, and Memorial Affairs
committee.name: House Veterans' Affairs

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to reimburse a person for the cost of acquiring a non-Government headstone or grave marker for placement in a cemetery other than a national cemetery in connection with the burial of a veteran.
